Sns.Subject: AWS Budgets: Monthly Budget has exceeded your alert threshold
Sns.Message:
AWS Budget Notification May 15, 2019
AWS Account 123456

Dear AWS Customer,

You requested that we alert you when the ACTUAL Cost associated with your Monthly Budget budget is greater than $981.00 for the current month. The ACTUAL Cost associated with this budget is $981.52. You can find additional details below and by accessing the AWS Budgets dashboard [1].

Budget Name: Monthly Budget
Budget Type: Cost
Budgeted Amount: $981.00
Alert Type: ACTUAL
Alert Threshold: > $981.00
ACTUAL Amount: $981.52

[1] https://console.aws.amazon.com/billing/home#/budgets
